channel.title: List of Things on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in List of Things on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 2016 roundup
item.description: So another year draws to a close and I thought I would review the last 12 months in my favourite data struture; lists. Think of this as a far less interesting homage to Fogus yearly reviews. Books Technical Over the last few years I consume less technical books purely because the content to be found online can be of great quality and books can rarely keep track with the rate of change in tech.
